body:
I'm back in my hotel room, bored and trying to pass the time. My traveling laptop cannot handle MC, so I decided to mess around on Cinema4D.

Here's a product of my boredom: http://imgur.com/Cxm6ir7

If you'd like something like this, fill out the form below.

MC Username:

Landscape (ie, a cave, a mountain):

Character Pose:

Monitor Dimensions:

Keep in mind I have a very packed schedule, and these take time. I'll try finish them quickly though.

IMPORTANT: I'll be doing these in order of difficulty, the more complex your request is, the later I will make it.

Enjoy!

Rough Order:

Riley

ALM

Eteh

Done:

Eric:
http://imgur.com/UsdzyTZ

Ingigo:
http://imgur.com/Wyj7Be4

Javi:

https://imgur.com/2FgIWQC

Tiny:

http://imgur.com/5Z4zgTA

ALM:

http://imgur.com/1sJG0mV

Unrendered (For anyone who wants to see):

http://imgur.com/JdpK1Kk

MC Username: ImRaging

Landscape (ie, a cave, a mountain): a plain grassland with a few trees and random landscape in background

Character Pose: jumping towards camera, punching the air with one leg driving up (like when you jump up.) Legoche and JustBudah to my left and right standing in random but natural poses (surprise me). They'll appear smaller because they're slightly further away. They have plain black capes, I have my rainbow one (http://www.needcoolshoes.com/banner?=pabpoKlKkKcKgK). Ik this may be really hard for you to do, but if you could make it flowing in the win that would be cool.
